subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
msgSnippet: Hi George, I am using the latest and greatest 5.0. Dan MacKay
messageBody:
Hi George,

I am using the latest and greatest 5.0.

Dan MacKay


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dinwiddie, George [mailto:George.Dinwiddie@arbitron.com]
> Sent: Thursday, February 15, 2001 9:15 AM
> To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
>
>
> Dan,
>
> Which version of Kawa are you running? I'm still running 3.51a
> I tried version 4.0, but thought it was a step backwards in
> many places.
>
> - George
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Dan MacKay [mailto:dmackay@kingston.hummingbird.com]
> > Sent: Wednesday, February 14, 2001 1:26 PM
> > To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: RE: [junit] Using JUnit with Kawa
> >
> >
> > Hi Eric,
> >
> > Thanks for the reply. Junit is launching fine. When I go run any
> > of my test
> > cases or suites from JUnit when it is launched from inside Kawa
> it cannot
> > find the test class files.
> >
> > Dan MacKay
>
>
